title: To Do
project-description: A To Do App to which the user can add and remove tasks, using Redux. The user can mark a task as completed or not and, using custom checkboxes.

title: HAPPY THOUGHTS
project-description: A responsive web site created in React which is fetching and posting data to an API, using useState and useEffect hooks.

title: Music Releases
project-description: A project in which I practised React, creating components and using data from Spotify. A responsive web site using HTML & CSS, also a practise in pair-programming.

title: Labyrinth
project-description: A text based game, an app that retrieves a list of actions from the backend and presents them to the user as interactable items. Handles the response delay with a loading animation.

title: Weather app
project-description: This is a weather app showing current weather and a forecast for three cities. The app fetch data from an API, follows given design guidelines and is responsive. The project is made by team of 2 using basic branching and merging in Git.

title: Quiz
project-description: This is a multiple-choice quiz game, made using Redux and via mob programming. My first project using Redux.

title: Guess Who Game
project-description: In this project I created a Guess Who game using JavaScript, practising objects, arrays and functions.

title: Chatbot
project-description: In this project I created a Guess Who game using JavaScript, practising objects, arrays and functions.
